verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to <S%H7802>Shushan<s%> Eduth. A Mikhtam of David, to) (teach; when he struggled with Aram-naharaim and with Aram-zobah, and Joab) (returned, and smote twelve thousand of Edom in the Valley of Salt.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou hast <S%H2186>rejected<s%> us. Thou hast <S%H6555>broken<s%> us; Thou hast <S%H599>been<s%> <S%H599>angry;<s%> O, <S%H7725>restore<s%> us.
Thou hast made the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7493>quake,<s%> Thou hast <S%H6480>split<s%> it <S%H6480>open;<s%> <S%H7495>Heal<s%> its <S%H7667>breaches,<s%> for it <S%H4131>totters.<s%>
Thou hast made Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>experience<s%> <S%H7186>hardship;<s%> Thou hast <S%H8248>given<s%> us <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> that makes us <S%H8653>stagger.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> to those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee, That it may be <S%H5264>displayed<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H9534>truth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
That Thy <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered,<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> with Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> us!

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in His <S%H6944>holiness:<s%> "I will <S%H5937>exult,<s%> I will <S%H2505>portion<s%> out <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and <S%H4058>measure<s%> out the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
<S%H1568>"Gilead<s%> is Mine, and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> is Mine; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also is the <S%H4581>helmet<s%> of My <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is My <S%H2710>scepter.<s%>

<S%H4124>"Moab<s%> is My <S%H7366>washbowl<s%><S%H5518>;<s%> <S%H5921>Over<s%> <S%H9000>Edom<s%> I shall <S%H7993>throw<s%> My <S%H5275>shoe;<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> <S%H7321>loud,<s%> O <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of Me!"
<S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4692>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me to <S%H9000>Edom<s%>?
Hast not Thou <S%H859>Thyself,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2186>rejected<s%> us? And wilt Thou not <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>armies,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%>?
O <S%H3051>give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%> For <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> by <S%H120>man<s%> is in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly,<s%> And it is He who will <S%H947>tread<s%> <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
